meanings.definition: A person who wears a vest.
meanings.sent1: The vestees at the party looked very stylish.
meanings.sent2: The vestees in the choir wore matching vests.
meanings.sent3: The vestees decided to have a vest-themed costume party.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like a bright vestees.
meanings.sent5: The vestees stood out with their colorful vests.

meanings.definition: The recipients of a vest or similar garment.
meanings.sent1: The vestees were grateful for the warm vests.
meanings.sent2: The vestees received their vests with smiles.
meanings.sent3: The vestees joked about starting a vest club.
meanings.sent4: Their vests transformed them into honorary vestees.
meanings.sent5: The vestees proudly showed off their new vests.
